User-Centred Design (UCD)

Platform Tech Solutions uses UCD Methodology for their projects. In which we try to optimize the product around how users can, want, or need to use the product, rather than forcing the users to change their behavior to accommodate the product Also we ensure that "development proceeds with the user as the center of focus."

Transparent Tracking system

The work that the Platform Tech Solutions does is in a very transparent way which provides the customers a high rate of visibility in their projects. In this way customer gets thier desirable products.

Market And Product Analysis

Platform tech solutions research for thier every project and analise it deeply to distinguish relationship between the product and market.According to these report we further start development process.

Cutting edge Technology

Platform Tech solutions use very new and reliable technologies based on product demand so that it produce a more stable and secure product.
What we Offer

Students

Platform Tech Solutions is a initiative by the Students, for the Students and to the Students. We are group of students from different Universities of India who provide Web Technologies solutions to our clients . Any student who is interested in Web Technologies can join OUR Team even he/she alrady knows WT or not because we also provide free trainings and Internships for students but the only condition is that you should be serious about WT.

Clients

Platform Tech Solutions is a start up company which provide WT Solutions. We made websites and also Progressive Web Apps using hot and trending Technologies like NodeJs/ReactJs, Python/Django ,php/wordpress . We have a number of clients and most of them have appreciated our work . Any company or individual who is intersed to take our Services is welcomed and we can assure you for Quality , Quantity and On-Time work .

NGOs

We as a group of Web Developers believes that if our Technical skills can cause a change in the society then we should go for it. That's why we provide free Tech support to Non Governmnet Organizations. The theme of our team is 'Work For Social Cause' And we ready to work for free-of-cost for any type of 'Work for Social Cause' and any NGO from whole globe is welcomed. We will be very happy to work with you with and become a helping hand.

mlaTrack

TECHNOLOGIES

Platform

  • Django/Python
  • NodeJs/ReactJs
  • Wordpress/PHP

Django is a high-level Python Web framework that encourages rapid development and clean, pragmatic design. Built by experienced developers, it takes care of much of the hassle of Web development, so you can focus on writing your app without needing to reinvent the wheel. It’s free and open source.

NodeJs is the run-time javascript which provides Backend solution in javascript and it is build on chrome V8 Engine and on the other hand we have ReactJs which is a javascript framework for Front-End.Combining these 2 is a great solution to make a full flages website.

PHP is a programming and scripting language to create dynamic interactive websites. WordPress is written using PHP as the scripting language. Just like WordPress, PHP is also an Open Source. PHP is a server side programming language. When a user requests a web page that contains PHP code, the code is processed by the PHP module installed on that web server. The PHP pre-processor then generates HTML output to be displayed on the user’s browser screen.

Why Choose Us

Platform Tech Solutions offers web application development assistance for business and marketing purposes. Platform tech solutions offer a full range of service levels, from the small static website to the complex custom web application. Programmer resources for staff-augmentation purposes are also available. Platform tech solutions use a variety of industry standard techniques and platforms to provide the best possible solutions for our clients' needs. In addition, we use industry leading enterprise-level application development tools to ensure each product is developed along a standard and efficient software development life cycle.

Platform tech solutions use the design template developed by PlatformTechCloud as the standard offering. If a more unique design is required, we will provide designs, wire frames, and build the client's site according to their specifications.

For medium- to large-size projects, we use a method of project management, which is intended to keep the client intimately involved with the direction of the project.
